name: Rope Man
description:
Fulfill your dreams of fixing broken fire hydrants by playing as Ropeman, the Rope Hero!

A: Move Left

D: Move Right

Space: Jump

Left-mouse button click: Shoot out rope

E: Retract rope

A Global Game Jam 2020 title by:

Yang-Che "Brian" Teng / Ruiming Wang / Corey Jackson / Xinjian Huang / Wes Wehner / Isaac James / Jason Butler

@NoiseBridge, SF
